statements: SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email_address FROM customer_data;
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customer_data ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, email_address FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id IN (101, 102, 103);
SELECT customer_id, purchase_history FROM customer_data WHERE purchase_history IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number, email_address FROM customer_data WHERE email_address LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number, purchase_history FROM customer_data WHERE purchase_history ->> 'latest_purchase' = '2021-10-15';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(customer_id) AS total_purchases FROM customer_data GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(customer_id) > 5 ORDER BY total_purchases DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customer_preferences ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, purchase_date, purchase_amount FROM purchase_history WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, email FROM customer_preferences WHERE address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, address FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date, purchase_amount FROM purchase_history WHERE customer_id = 2 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_preferences ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_purchase_amount FROM purchase_history GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_purchase_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number, email FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT email FROM customers WHERE address ~* '^[0-9]+ .* Road';
SELECT * FROM purchase_history;
SELECT customer_id, product_name, purchase_amount FROM purchase_history WHERE purchase_amount > 100;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS num_purchases FROM purchase_history GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, product_category, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_amount FROM purchase_history GROUP BY customer_id, product_category;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date, product_name FROM purchase_history ORDER BY customer_id ASC, purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences;
SELECT preference_name, preference_value FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM purchase_history ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_category, purchase_amount FROM purchase_history WHERE purchase_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, contact_type, contact_value FROM customer_contacts WHERE customer_id = 2003;
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences;
SELECT customer_id, preference_1, preference_2 FROM customer_preferences;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_info WHERE phone_number = '+1234567890';
SELECT product_name, price FROM product_catalog ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT customer_id, preference_1, preference_2 FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_info WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT product_id, product_name, price, category FROM product_catalog ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM purchase_history GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY start_date;
